Package game.controllers

Class RunesManager

java.lang.Object
game.controllers.RunesManager
public class RunesManager extends Object
A class that manages Runes object like transaction of runes, increment or decrement of runes amount. Created by:
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Che'er Min Yi, Chong Ming Sheng, Lam Xin Yuan

    • getInstance

      public static RunesManager getInstance()

      Returns:
      the instance of RunesManger

    • rewardRunes

      public String rewardRunes(Actor target, Actor attacker)
      Award some runes amount to playerRunes by incrementing playerRunes
      Parameters:
      target - the actor that reward runes based on its range of rewarding
      attacker - the actor that receive rewarded runes
      Returns:
      String of message that describe the reward of runes to Actor target

    • generateAmount

      public int generateAmount(int minReward, int maxReward)
      Compute an exact amount of runes given a lower boundary and upper boundary
      Parameters:
      minReward - lower boundary
      maxReward - upper boundary
      Returns:
      an int value between lower boundary and upper boundary
      See Also:
      • RandomNumberGenerator

    • getMinMaxRunesOf

      public int[] getMinMaxRunesOf(Actor target)
      Obtain the minimum and maximum runes that Actor target can reward
      Parameters:
      target - the actor that reward runes
      Returns:
      an array of size 2 where first element is an int value of the minimum runes amount and second element is an int value of the maximum runes amount

    • incrementPlayerRunes

      public void incrementPlayerRunes(int amount)
      Increase the amount of playerRunes.
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to be added into playerRunes.

    • decrementPlayerRunes

      public void decrementPlayerRunes(int amount)
      Decrease the amount of playerRunes.
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to be deducted from playerRunes.
